notesStmt.note: A fragment from Sa'adia Gaon's First Baqasha that starts אתה הוא יי'י לבדך, which is included in Kitāb jāmiʾ aṣ-ṣalawāt wat-tāsābīh (Sidur Rav Seʹadyah Gaʾon/ Israel Davidson [ed.]. Yerushalayim : Ḥevrat Meḳitse nirdamim, 1963, pp. 47-53); On recto, what little that can be read starts with the text found in the published edition, p. 52 l. . 2 עדי עד. The verso continues l. 10 [בהרר[י to p. 53 l. 3 [בא[רץ.
Condition: damaged, torn with losses from one(?) edge; recto mostly faded and illegible.
